import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./type.scss"; const Typefilter = (props) => { const [allTypes, setAllTypes] = useState(false); const [allChecked, setAllChecked] = useState(false); const [commonStock, setCommonStock] = useState(false); const [preferredStock, setPreferredStock] = useState(false); const [index, setIndex] = useState(false); const [corporateDebt, setCorporateDebt] = useState(false); const [fms, setFms] = useState(false); let typeData = [ { label: "All", value: "All" }, { label: "Common Stock", value: "commonStock" }, { label: "Preffered Stock", value: "prefferedStock" }, { label: "Index", value: "index" }, { label: "Corporate Debt", value: "corporateDebt" }, { label: "FMS", value: "fms" }, ]; return (
); }; export default Typefilter;
